description: The irony of wishing for a fixed clock at the same broken time.
title: Broken Wishes
n_1: John and Ella are sitting in the living room.
c1_1: Every night at 11:11, I make a wish.
c2_1: Really? What do you wish for?
n_2: John looks at the broken clock on the wall.
c1_2: That someone will fix my broken clock.
n_3: Ella laughs and shakes her head.
